Review Body: With the truly wireless earphones industry just exploding after the coming of Airpods, there are many companies which have come with budget offerings. The realme Buds Air 2 is one the best when it comes to the value for money with respect to the features that these earphones are offering. I have created an indepth review and comparison along with an unboxing of these earphones on my youtube channel - Unbox Daily Tech which covers all the aspects of these earphones along with pairing, mic test and realme link app review.The ANC offered by these earphones is decent which is rated at 25 db, although more expensive offering from the likes of Sennheiser and JBL offer ANC of more than 100 db but then they are prices upto 3 times or 4 times than these earphones. The sound quality is decent with a good mix of highs and lows and the overall music listening experience is a pleasure. The earphones are very very lightweight and majority of the times you will completely forget even you are even wearing the same. The design looks premium with a mix of Airpods Pro and Airpods 2. The look and feel of the product is also good which boosts some features like the intelligent touch controls, google smart pair, auto on/off and transparency mode.Overall an amazing deal. Go for these without any doubts.
